CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 20, 1958, pg. 11, reads: "Grand Opening at Renee's - Shown are members of the faculty of Renee's Dance Studio at their grand opening last Sunday in beautiful Terrace Room of the Terrace Hall Hotel, 2337 Centre Ave...  Guests at the grand opening were treated to food and refreshment, plus a floor show, featuring Lois (Shorts) Davis, Rudolph Moses, Sara Burney and others.  The management received a bevy of greeting via telegrams and flowers.  For information, call ATlantic 1-1171 or MAyflower 1-8870. - Harris Photo. - Adv."
TitMainTitle: Four women seated in booth with cordial glasses, and standing from left: Marlene Stevens (McEnheimer), Yvonne Jones Kemp, man, Vera Thompson (Matthews), Barbara Robinson, and unknown in Terrace Room of Terrace Hall Hotel for opening of Renee's Dance Studio, 2337 Centre Avenue,
